text_logic_form: The line $BD$ is the hypotenuse of triangle $ABC$.
Find the length of the altitude of triangle $ABC$.
dissolved_text_logic_form: The line $BD$ is the hypotenuse of triangle $ABC$.

diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $AD$ is $21$ units.
The length of the line $CD$ is $7$ units.
Point $D$ lies on the line connecting $A$ and $C$.
The line $AB$ is perpendicular to the line $BD$.
The line $BD$ is perpendicular to the line $CD$.
line_instances: There are lines $AB$, $AC$, and $BC$, forming triangle $ABC$.
There are lines $AD$, $BD$, and $CD$, forming triangle $ABD$.
